description: This file contains variables that will be set in SSM.

production.LOGIN_WHITELIST: ...set to comma separated list of emails that can access the app...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_LOG_FOLDER_ID: ...set to the Synapse folder ID where logs will be stored...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_TEAM_MANAGER_US: ...set to comma separated list of user IDs to add to the project team as managers...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_GRANT_PROJECT_A: ...set to comma separated list of principal IDs and permission code (123:ADMIN,124:CAN_EDIT)...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_GRANT_TEAM_ENTI: ...set to comma separated list of synapse IDs and permission code (syn123:ADMIN,syn124:CAN_EDIT)...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_FOLDER_NAMES: ...set to comma separated list of folder names...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_WIKI_PROJECT_ID: ...set to the Synapse project ID to copy the wiki from...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_CONTRIBUTION_AG: ...set to the Synapse table ID to update contribution agreement data...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DCA_CREATE_ADDITIONAL_PART: ...set to DCA institution additional parties JSON config...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DAA_GRANT_ACCESS_ADDITIONA: ...set to DAA institution additional parties JSON config...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DAA_GRANT_ACCESS_AGREEMENT: ...set to the Synapse table ID to update access agreement data...
production.SYNAPSE_SPACE_DAA_GRANT_ACCESS_TEAM_MANA: ...set to comma separated list of user IDs to add to the team as managers...
